skill.description: WEB front-end basic skills about HTML CSS and javascript and a set of related languages like pug sass and coffeescript.
WEB front-end application development with javascript front-end platforms such as reactjs.
Usage of new-generation ECMAScript with babeljs.
RESTful server building with expressjs on nodejs.

project.name: Babel Arena
project.description: An on-line editor for babel.js with a series of tutorials.

project.name: Marksman

project.name: Development of SEU Most Influential Graduates Online Vote System of 2015 and 2016
project.description: I was one of the members of the development team of SEU most influential annual online vote, which has been held for several years. I developed the front-end of the WEB vote application of this activity of 2015 and 2016 and succeeded.
